init.title: Ajax Systems Options
init.description: Configure your Ajax Systems integration settings.

general.title: General Settings
general.description: Configure polling interval and general settings.

data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the Ajax API (in seconds). Minimum: 3s, Maximum: 300s (5 minutes).

sqs.title: Real-Time Events (AWS SQS)
sqs.description:
Configure AWS SQS for instant event notifications.

This requires an Enterprise API account with AWS SQS access. Events will be received in real-time instead of waiting for the next poll.

data_description.sqs_enabled: Enable real-time event reception via AWS SQS.
data_description.sqs_queue_url: The full SQS queue URL (e.g., https://sqs.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/...)
data_description.aws_access_key: Your AWS Access Key ID for SQS access.
data_description.aws_secret_key: Your AWS Secret Access Key for SQS access.
data_description.aws_region: AWS region where your SQS queue is located (default: eu-west-1).

error.sqs_queue_url_required: SQS Queue URL is required when SQS is enabled.
error.sqs_queue_url_invalid: Invalid SQS Queue URL. It should start with https://sqs.
error.aws_access_key_required: AWS Access Key is required when SQS is enabled.
error.aws_secret_key_required: AWS Secret Key is required when SQS is enabled.
